item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，赛峰集团将选择法国而非加拿大和美国进行大型工厂投资
item.description: 法国航空航天集团赛峰集团（Safran）在法国、美国和加拿大进行了选址角逐后，即将决定在法国新建一座耗资4亿欧元的碳制动器工厂。【原文：French aerospace group Safran is nearing a decision to pick France as home for a new 400-million-euro carbon brakes factory following a contest between sites in France, the United States and Canada, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 伯恩利为球迷提供虚拟现实座椅
item.description: 英超新升班马伯恩利队正在为球迷提供虚拟现实观赛体验，这意味着他们可以在自己的房间里享受在俱乐部特夫摩尔球场观赛的乐趣。【原文：Newly-promoted Premier League team Burnley are offering their fans a virtual reality viewing experience, meaning they can enjoy being at the club's Turf Moor stadium from their room.】

item.title: 美国财政部保持票据和债券拍卖规模稳定，增加债务回购
item.description: 美国财政部周三表示，预计至少在未来几个季度内不会增加票据和债券的拍卖规模，这与市场预期一致，因为财政部宣布将在 8 月至 2025 年 10 月期间退款 1,250 亿美元。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department said on Wednesday it does not anticipate increasing auction sizes for notes and bonds for at least the next several quarters, in line with market expectations, as it announced a $125 billion refunding from August to October 2025.】

item.title: 空中客车公司季度利润增长，维持预期
item.description: 欧洲飞机制造商空中客车公司（Airbus）周三公布了高于预期的第二季度利润，国防和直升机部门的业绩提振了该公司的业绩。【原文：European planemaker Airbus on Wednesday posted a higher-than-expected second-quarter profit, boosted by its defence and helicopter units, and maintained full-year forecasts as it aims to reverse a drop in jetliner deliveries.】

item.title: 消息人士称雪佛龙公司获得美国颁发的在委内瑞拉运营的限制性许可证
item.description: 三位接近该决定的消息人士周三表示，雪佛龙公司已获得在受制裁的委内瑞拉开展业务的美国限制性许可，并补充说，石油收益不得以任何方式转给委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗的政府。【原文：Chevron has been granted a restricted U.S. license to operate in sanctioned Venezuela, three sources close to the decision said on Wednesday, adding that no money from oil proceeds can be transferred in any way to the administration of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro.】

item.title: 雷诺任命采购总监弗朗索瓦-普罗沃斯特（Francois Provost）为新任首席执行官
item.description: 雷诺周三任命其首席采购官弗朗索瓦-普罗沃斯特（Francois Provost）为首席执行官，选择了一位鲜为人知的公司内部人士来带领这家法国汽车制造商应对日益激烈的竞争和本月初引发利润预警的疲软需求。【原文：Renault named Francois Provost, its chief procurement officer, as CEO on Wednesday, opting for a little-known company insider to steer the French carmaker through growing competition and weak demand that triggered a profit warning earlier this month.】

item.title: 消息人士称，咖啡连锁店黑岩咖啡秘密申请上市
item.description: 据四位熟悉内情的人士透露，黑石咖啡吧已秘密申请在纽约进行首次公开募股，该连锁咖啡馆的估值可能超过 10 亿美元。【原文：Black Rock Coffee Bar has filed confidentially for an initial public offering in New York that could value the cafe chain at more than $1 billion, according to four people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 消息人士称，JD.com 与德国 Ceconomy 的收购谈判已进入最后阶段
item.description: 消息人士周三告诉路透社，德国电子产品零售商 Ceconomy 股东之间关于中国 JD.com 可能收购该公司的谈判已进入最后阶段，有可能在周三晚间宣布。【原文：Talks between the shareholders of German electronics retailer Ceconomy over a potential takeover by China's JD.com are on the home stretch, sources told Reuters on Wednesday, with an announcement possible on Wednesday evening.】

item.title: KKR 募集 65 亿美元用于资产担保融资
item.description: 投资巨头 KKR 周三表示，随着公司和投资者寻求传统贷款以外的信贷替代方案，该公司已筹集 65 亿美元，用于提供资产担保融资。【原文：Investment giant KKR said on Wednesday it had raised $6.5 billion to provide asset-backed financing, as companies and investors seek out credit alternatives beyond traditional loans.】

item.title: 意大利莱昂纳多公司在订单、现金和净债务方面提高了 2025 年的指导目标
item.description: 意大利航空航天与防务集团莱昂纳多（Leonardo）在公布了今年前六个月 "稳健 "的业绩后，周三提高了 2025 年的订单、自由现金流和净债务指导。【原文：Italy's aerospace and defence group Leonardo on Wednesday improved its 2025 guidance for orders, free cash flow and net debt, after posting "solid" results for the first six months of the year.】

item.title: 荷兰法院称 Stellantis 现在拥有的柴油品牌从 2009 年起就有作弊软件
item.description: 荷兰一家法院周三称，欧宝、标致、雪铁龙和 DS 自 2009 年起在荷兰销售的柴油车中含有专门用于在排放测试中作弊的软件。【原文：A Dutch court on Wednesday said diesel cars sold by Opel, Peugeot, Citroen and DS in the Netherlands from 2009 contained software designed to cheat emissions tests.】

item.title: 富国银行加入华尔街合唱团，上调标准普尔 500 指数年度目标
item.description: 富国银行投资研究所（Wells Fargo Investment Institute）周三以关税延迟和企业盈利强劲为由，上调了美国 500 指数（S&P 500）的年终目标，成为最新一家上调该指数年终目标的华尔街研究机构。【原文：Wells Fargo Investment Institute on Wednesday became the latest Wall Street research house to lift its year-end target for the S&P 500 index, citing tariff delays and strong corporate earnings.】

item.title: 消息人士称，谷歌将向印度南部数据中心投资 60 亿美元
item.description: 印度政府消息人士周三表示，谷歌将投资 60 亿美元在印度南部安得拉邦开发一个千兆瓦级数据中心及其电力基础设施，这是 Alphabet 旗下公司在印度的首次此类投资。【原文：Google will invest $6 billion to develop a 1-gigawatt data centre and its power infrastructure in the southern Indian state of Andhra Pradesh in the Alphabet unit's first such investment in India, government sources said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 博鳌亚洲论坛调查显示，随着约会成本上升，一些 Z 世代成年人在约会上不花钱
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America）周三的一项调查显示，美国的 Z 世代成年人（目前只有十几岁和二十几岁）在面对生活成本上升的问题时，在约会花费方面变得更加节俭。【原文：Gen Z adults in the U.S. - those currently in their teens and 20s - are becoming more frugal about what they spend on dates as they contend with higher living costs, a Bank of America survey showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 联邦通信委员会开始调查康卡斯特与地方电视台的关系
item.description: 联邦通信委员会主席正在对 NBC 母公司康卡斯特与当地广播电视附属公司的关系展开调查，这是对美国主要广播公司进行的一系列调查中的最新调查。【原文：The chair of the Federal Communications Commission is opening a probe into NBC-parent Comcast’s relationships with its local broadcast TV affiliates, the latest in a series of investigations into major U.S. broadcasters.】

item.title: 美国 6 月成屋销售降幅超预期
item.description: 受抵押贷款利率上升的影响，6 月份美国旧房购买合同降幅超过预期。【原文：Contracts to buy previously owned U.S. homes dropped more than expected in June, weighed down by higher mortgage rates.】

item.title: 西班牙电信公司（Telefonica）在西班牙和德国放弃了华为的 5G 设备，但在巴西保留了该设备
item.description: 西班牙电信巨头 Telefonica 正在更换其在西班牙和德国由中国制造商华为制造的所有 5G 设备，以符合当地的规定，但它打算在巴西保留这些设备。【原文：Spanish telecom giant Telefonica is replacing all of its 5G equipment made by Chinese manufacturer Huawei in Spain and Germany to comply with local rules, but it intends to keep it in Brazil.】

item.title: 加拿大央行维持利率稳定，称全球贸易战风险降低
item.description: 作者：Promit Mukherjee 和 David Ljunggren【原文：By Promit Mukherjee and David Ljunggren】

item.title: 加拿大央行称全球严重贸易冲突的风险已经降低
item.description: 路透加拿大渥太华7月30日电--加拿大央行周三表示，自4月份以来，全球贸易冲突严重升级的风险已经降低，而且美国关税的前景也已有所明朗。【原文：OTTAWA, July 30 (Reuters) - The risk of a severe and escalating global trade conflict has diminished since April and there is some clarity about what U.S. tariffs will look like, the Bank of Canada said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 印美贸易谈判因农产品市场争执而搁浅
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三表示，美国将从 8 月 1 日起对印度商品征收 25% 的关税，理由是新德里的高关税和严格的非货币贸易壁垒。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Wednesday the United States would impose a 25% tariff on Indian goods starting August 1, citing New Delhi’s high tariffs and strict non-monetary trade barriers.】

item.title: 新日铁交易后，美国钢铁公司任命三名美国董事
item.description: 美国钢铁公司（U.S. Steel）周三表示，在新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel）完成对该公司价值 149 亿美元的收购一个多月后，该公司已任命三名美国董事进入董事会。【原文：U.S. Steel said on Wednesday it has appointed three American directors to its board, more than a month after Nippon Steel closed its $14.9-billion acquisition of the company.】

item.title: 摩根大通与 Coinbase 合作，通过信用卡购买加密货币
item.description: 美国银行业巨头摩根大通（JPMorgan）周三与 Coinbase 达成合作，允许客户从 2025 年秋季开始使用其大通信用卡为钱包充值，并在交易所购买加密货币。【原文：U.S. banking giant JPMorgan on Wednesday partnered with Coinbase to allow customers to fund their wallets using its Chase credit cards and buy cryptocurrency on the exchange starting in fall 2025.】

item.title: 由于互联网安全威胁，俄罗斯封锁了 Ookla 的在线 Speedtest 服务
item.description: 俄罗斯通信监管机构Roskomnadzor周三表示，由于美国公司Ookla运营的互联网性能工具Speedtest对俄罗斯互联网安全构成威胁，该机构已将其屏蔽。【原文：Russia's communications regulator Roskomnadzor said on Wednesday it had blocked the internet performance tool Speedtest, run by U.S. company Ookla, due to what it described as threats to Russia's internet security.】

item.title: 需求低迷，梅赛德斯-奔驰暂停向美国交付电动汽车
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）汽车制造商周三表示，将暂停向美国交付 EQ 电动车系列，以应对需求放缓和经销商库存高企的问题。【原文：Mercedes-Benz will pause deliveries of its EQ electric range to the United States, the carmaker said on Wednesday as it responded to slowing demand and high inventories at dealerships.】

item.title: 软件初创公司 Observe 在萨特希尔主导的融资活动中获得 1.56 亿美元融资
item.description: Observe公司的工具有助于检测和解决应用程序系统中的问题，该公司表示，随着对帮助企业管理日益增多的海量数据的软件需求的增加，它已在私募股权公司Sutter Hill Ventures领投的一轮融资中筹集了1.56亿美元。【原文：Observe, whose tools help detect and resolve issues in app systems, said it has raised $156 million in a funding round led by private equity firm Sutter Hill Ventures as demand rises for software that helps businesses manage a growing deluge of data.】

item.title: 罗技首席执行官表示，从中国转移生产已取得进展
item.description: 罗技国际首席执行官汉内克-法贝尔（Hanneke Faber）周三表示，将生产线迁出中国以应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关税影响的计划 "进展顺利"。【原文：Logitech International is "well on track" with plans to move production lines out of China to manage the impact of U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs, Chief Executive Hanneke Faber said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 墨西哥第二季度经济环比增长超预期
item.description: 墨西哥国家统计局（INEGI）周三的初步估计显示，墨西哥第二季度经济较前三个月增长了0.7%，高于市场预期。【原文：Mexico's economy grew 0.7% in the second quarter from the previous three-month period, a preliminary estimate from national statistics agency INEGI showed on Wednesday, beating market expectations.】

item.title: Zillow 被 CoStar 起诉侵犯版权
item.description: Zillow 周三遭到房地产信息提供商 CoStar Group 的起诉，后者指控这家美国最大的在线房地产门户网站未经许可发布了至少 46979 张受版权保护的照片。【原文：Zillow was sued on Wednesday by real estate information provider CoStar Group , which accused the largest U.S. online real estate portal of publishing at least 46,979 copyrighted photos without permission.】

item.title: 美联储召开会议，第二季度数据公布，特朗普力推降息
item.description: 在数据显示美国第二季度经济增长反弹幅度超过预期之后，唐纳德-特朗普总统周三再次呼吁美联储降低基准利率。【原文：President Donald Trump on Wednesday again called on the Federal Reserve to lower benchmark rates after data showed U.S. economic growth rebounded more than expected in the second quarter.】

item.title: 美国第二季度经济反弹
item.description: 美国第二季度经济增长的反弹幅度超过预期，但这严重夸大了经济的健康状况，因为进口的减少是经济增长的主要原因，而消费者支出的增长幅度也不大。【原文：U.S. economic growth rebounded more than expected in the second quarter, but that grossly overstated the economy's health as subsiding imports accounted for the bulk of the improvement and consumer spending increased moderately.】
